Sentencas: A simple electrophoretic method is developed for the fabrication of high quality electrolyte film on NiO-YSZ anode substrate for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) application.
Titulo: Organic acids as electrostatic dispersing agents to prepare high quality particulate thin film

Sentencas: benzoic acid and trimellitic acid have been explored as electrostatic stabilizer to prepare yttria stabilized zirconia (8YSZ) suspensions in isopropanol medium.
Titulo: Organic acids as electrostatic dispersing agents to prepare high quality particulate thin film

Sentencas: Systematic studies on different suspension properties and deposition kinetics are carried out for each stabilizing agent to optimize the suspension chemistries and deposition conditions.
Titulo: Organic acids as electrostatic dispersing agents to prepare high quality particulate thin film

Sentencas: Successful cathodic deposition has been achieved on polymer coated NiO-YSZ anode substrate using both benzoic acid and trimellitic acid as charging agents.
Titulo: Organic acids as electrostatic dispersing agents to prepare high quality particulate thin film

Sentencas: Upon co-firing at 1400 degrees C, these films resulted in well-adhered dense YSZ coating (thickness: 7-12 mu m) on the porous anode substrate.
Titulo: Organic acids as electrostatic dispersing agents to prepare high quality particulate thin film

Sentencas: SOFC coupon cells are then fabricated by screen-printing La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 cathode layer on the top of the electrolyte.
Titulo: Organic acids as electrostatic dispersing agents to prepare high quality particulate thin film

Sentencas: Maximum current densities as obtained from these single cells vary in the range of 1.3-1.6 A/cm(2) for a cell voltage of 0.7 at 800 degrees C. (C) 2017
